title: "X main here, I actually think X is too strong"
body:
Or most thread like this always makes me laugh.
A quick look at the magical site op.gg, says here that you've literally touched this champion like twice. Seriously, if you're that desperate for nerfs to something, present actual facts and not try to win fake credibility through announcing your "dedication" to the champion.

replies.body: As an Ao Shin main, I actually think he should be released some time next year.

And then nerfed, of course

He has a 100% not losing ratio
But his low pick rate means that only dedicated ao shin mains who know him well are playing him.

How many times do I have to freaking say it?  A high skill ceiling doesn't excuse a complete lack of counterplay.  He needs his base damages gutted, because he's somehow a lane bully and a hypercarry at the exact same time.
*Insert hateful comment about balance here*
thought we were taking about ao shin, not draven.
{{champion:69}}

{{champion:268}} 

It's funny because what Remlap said was the exact same complaints levied against this champ and yours, before both were nerfed.
We can't even trust any of the stats we have on Ao Shin because his play rate is so low. Hell, I can't even remember the last time I saw one.
Next year seems a bit optimistic don't you think?

> [{quoted}](name=WillieTheWhale,realm=EUW,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=GMxUbOE1,comment-id=00080001,timestamp=2015-12-14T13:52:32.147+0000)
>
> Next year seems a bit optimistic don't you think?

sadly yes

It'd probably be better to check their champion mastery in the league client.  I don't think op.gg lists the total games played on specific champions.  Just what was played per season in ranked, right?  Normal draft and blind isn't counted on op.gg  like champion mastery will.
I do that if there are no records of the champion on their op.gg. Guess I should I stated that XD
You should do that first, not as a secondary check.

I will end up doing the match history search like right after, op.gg is just to check records of ranked. If there are none, then i go straight to match history and look at that because op.gg is kind of unreliable when it comes to normals.
what if they are not In my server
yeah but mastery didn't exist before a certain time like go look up my mastery on taric ive played him since like s2 but ive only played 3 games with him since mastery came out.
Normal games are counted in the Champions tab on NA.OP.GG
Poppy main here, and I think the rework was shit.
Hahahaha Nice one. Those are only myths.
Remember: nobody mains the really unpopular champions. Until a rework comes at them because they're unpopular, then half the forum mains those champions.

http://www.lolking.net/summoner/na/23735636

I guess I'm not a Poppy main anymore anyway :/
It was a joke.... I was also a Poppy main.

New Zyra main here, Zyra is basically freelo, plz nerf!

;) actually I'm hoping she'll continue to be overlooked

> [{quoted}](name=DeynaTaggerung,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=GMxUbOE1,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-12-13T17:42:53.013+0000)
>

> ;) actually I'm hoping she'll continue to be overlooked

Well,that is the one thing zyra excels at,almost nobody is as good at being overlooked as zyra is.

Unless you're talking about players that is...
Overlooked is Zyra's best thing? Do you even {{champion:3}} or {{champion:161}}.They're monsters if played and built correctly
vel to me seems to be someone that everyone knows is borderline op, but is low playrate so he is ignored
Only time Vel has ever felt OP is when support Vel was much more popular than it is now because of his high base damage and that once he hit six someone's ass was grass.
He's not OP but he's definitely strong if done correctly.
Indeed. He was actually the first new champion to come out when I started playing and he's been my go to mid laner since then.
galio WRECKS aram/poro king because he has access to snowballs for a reliable gapcloser for his ult. he can just towerdive and eat aggro while your lux/brand/kat/whatever wrecks face

I went up against a Brand as Galio the other day, was such an easy lane with Brand's passive healing me back for the damage he dealt with his abilities because of Galio's W. Shame we lost that game due to our comp being a bunch of squishies aside from me.
Don't tell them!
I mean I don't main {{champion:157}}, but I have 100k mastery with him and he is way too strong in the right hands
Lol my most played champion got 25k :D

Yea I also have 260k on {{champion:75}} 180k on {{champion:122}} and 75k on {{champion:11}} 

Don't be like me I don't have a life lol

i got 71k on my akali and 30-40 k on the other champs i love to play

i'm a filler with some nice off-meta picks (ok i have to go support, i'm going orianna support =D),but next season with that role select i'll spam all my mains and get around 100k on each

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} 

I didn't play much, that season, but still i have played about 3k normal games and 800 rankeds from end of season 1.

Op.gg is pretty unreliable. Besides, you can main a champion and not play ranked, like ever. I know at this point I've had about 100 matches on Talon alone, but most of it went unrecorded because the mastery system wasn't always up. Have you given that consideration? I use to main Udyr back when i first hit level 30 and for the longest time he was my go to guy. I also played Aatrox a lot, Jax, and occasionally Ezreal. But then I stopped for one reason or another. Now I rarely play normal games, let alone enough to win and get my mastery up on my champions.

Even if you are main. Who cares if a bronze Riven main thinks Riven is broken even though she's trash tier this preseason?

If you want to complain about a champion, reason your complaint. Saying that you "main them" means nothing to me even if you are Froggen himself.

Its quite funny as most of those sites only show ranked games, and I one of the people who hate solo queue and refuse to play it.  But that doesn't mean I don't main Kassadin, or Jayce, or Irelia.  Which are my 3 most played champions....

a perfect example of this: someone whose name rhymes with "nutritious mettle"

literally silver, and everyone worshiped him like a god

Are you really going to whine about someone actively working towards making this game and community better? He is having fun playing Morde and is dedicated to his hobby. He was a beam of light for all Morde mains who did not have a way with words like he did, yet were just as unhappy with the changes as Malicious Metal was. Sure he's Gold V. But you're fxcking Silver II. I don't believe rank should be used as an argument, but since you do, look are your own before putting down someone else for theirs.

Tsk tsk.
I've played 13 ranked games and won 9 lol. I avoid ranked because it's toxic. Someone who plays as much as him is just plain bad, because it means you literally are struggling to climb.

No matter how much he plays ranked and how much you don't play it, one doesn't need to be diamond to realize the champion they liked to play doesn't feel the same at all. He wanted solo lane Mordekaiser back, and it's coming back.
udyr main here i have about 200ish games at about 60% winrate he needs a buff to tiger and a nerf to pheonix plz XD
Irelia Main here, I think she needs compensation buffs because they trashed Trinity Force. Thanks.

Rarely do I comment on how champions should be changed. The exceptions of course are Veigar, Soraka, and Zilean.

I Also only ever play normals, so if you look me up, you won't find "hundreds" of games played.
but X is darius(technically its y) right?

Does it count if I have over 150k mastery points on the champion--
Even though I feel Diana doesn't really need any changes.
